document_data.name: Clan Urlingscar
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Urlingscar''' was one of the prominent [[dragonborn]] clans of [[Relmaur]], in [[Laerakond]].
document_data.History: Clan Urlingscar was the traditional ruling clan of Relmaur. However, as of [[1479 DR]], the head of the clan, [[Harangor Urlingscar]], allowed members of other clans to participate in the government of the nation, by appointing members to the [[Crown Council]].
document_data.Known members: *[[Harangor Urlingscar]], the head of the clan in 1479 DR.
